projects.title: Ensemble - Artist Collaboration
projects.description_short: Ensemble is a platform for networking and collaboration dedicated to artists, allowing them to grow their demographics and connect with peers in their fields!
projects.description_long: Ensemble is a social-media mobile application dedicated to artists. Through this platform, we provide a way for artists to share their craft with their fans and peers. Our platform encourages collaboration between artists, providing them a means to match with their peers and work on something new together!

projects.title: Image Processing
projects.description_short: Transform your images with ease using my p5.js-powered web app, offering advanced manipulation features like gray-scaling, inversion, and kernel convolutions.
projects.description_long: Discover a powerful web-based image processing application developed with JavaScript and p5.js, enabling users to perform both simple and advanced image manipulation operations such as gray-scaling, inversion, and edge detection using kernel convolution! This project showcases my ability to leverage JavaScript and p5.js for creating sophisticated, interactive web applications, making it an impressive demonstration of my web development and problem-solving abilities.

projects.title: Connect Four
projects.description_short: A fun and interactive recreation of the popular Connect Four game with Multi-player and Single-Player gamemodes featuring an unbeatable AI player.
projects.description_long: The classic Connect Four game reimagined in Java, featuring both multiplayer and single-player modes. In single-player mode, challenge yourself against an unbeatable AI opponent, meticulously crafted using the Minimax algorithm and enhanced with Alpha-Beta pruning and Heuristic Move Ordering for optimal performance. This project showcases advanced algorithmic implementation, seamless user interaction, and strategic gameplay dynamics, making it an impressive demonstration of Java programming and artificial intelligence techniques.

projects.title: TravelQuest
projects.description_short: An ultimate one-stop service allowing you to create seamless package bookings for hotels, flights and car rentalsâ€”all with just a few clicks!
projects.description_long: TravelQuest is a robust and dynamic full-stack web application developed using ASP.NET, designed to streamline travel bookings for flights, hotels, and car rentals. This comprehensive platform offers an intuitive user experience, enabling seamless browsing and package bookings

projects.title: Event Scheduling API
projects.description_short: A Spring Boot-powered backend for managing rooms and events, allowing authorized users to book venues seamlessly.
projects.description_long: A Spring Boot-based backend system designed to facilitate room reservations and event management. It provides authentication and role-based access control, ensuring only authorized users can book venues. The system includes RESTful APIs for creating, updating, and managing events, handling room availability, and enforcing booking policies. Ideal for organizations needing efficient scheduling and resource management.

projects.title: Machine Learning
projects.description_short: Detailed experiments comprising of utilizing various Machine Learning algorithms on real-world datasets following the complete Data Science pipeline!
projects.description_long: Explore my comprehensive collection of experiments dedicated to Machine Learning and Data Science, showcasing a diverse array of projects involving Clustering, Classification, Regression, and Neural Networks. Each project demonstrates my expertise in the full data science pipeline from Exploratory Data Analysis & Visualization to Data Preprocessing & Cleanup to Implementing appropriate models and finally interpreting results and deriving observations.

projects.title: Perceptron Visualisation
projects.description_short: See the working of a Perceptron-based neural network in real time as it gradually regresses on a linear function and 'learns' to convert from Celsius to Farhenheit.
projects.description_long: This Java based project showcases the training of a Perceptron, a unit of a neural network on linear functions and its learning using the backpropagation algorithm coded from scratch and visualized using the Processing library. This project demonstrates my proficiency in Java programming, deep learning concepts and interactive data visualisation techniques, making it an apt showcase of my software development skills.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description_long: The project you are currently viewing, my portfolio website was designed and coded from scratch using REACT (Vite) in TypeScript and styled using Tailwind CSS. The website showcases my skills and abilities as a developer and designer not only through its content but by its design as well. This project is in active development and will continue to evolve with me as I grow as a developer.

projects.title: Learning Voyage
projects.description_short: Empowering Community-driven learning with seamless resource sharing, all crafted using the powerful LAMP stack!
projects.description_long: Learning Voyage is an innovative community-driven learning platform developed using the LAMP stack, designed to empower users to create and share custom learning paths for a wide range of topics. Learning Voyage demonstrates my ability to create complex, user-centric web applications, combining secure backend processes with a rich, interactive frontend, making it an impressive example of my full-stack development skills.

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description_short: A simple, yet sophpisticated Expense Tracker to organize your budget and provide detailed reports and statistics regarding your monthly and annual expenditures!
projects.description_long: This simple, yet sophisticated Expense Tracker is designed to help you easily organize your income and expenses, providing detailed reports and statistics regarding your monthly and annual expenditures. The application prioritizes security and stores all data on a local sqlite database and contains secure user management with password hashing and resetting facilities.
